name: Iron Furnace
pages: The Iron furnace is 1.33x more faster than the vanilla furnace, below is the recipe for it. This furnace can use any of these $(l:upgrades)upgrades/$, and requires the $(#0000FF)regular/$ or $(l:patchouli:furnaces/copper_furnace)copper furnace/$ to craft. Additionally it requires a $(l:patchouli:items/iron_conductor_block)iron conductor block/$ in one of its recipe.
